about_the_game:
Horizon Odyssey takes place in a world with many secrets, collectibles, puzzles, maps and enemies. If you are the kind of player that wants all secrets and collectibles in the world of Horizon Odyssey, then this Walkthrough is for you.

The 180 page Walkthrough contains:
  • -Maps of all areas in the world listing all points of interest and collectibles
  • -Strategies for most enemies and all bosses
  • -All major collectibles (Orbs, Paradox Miasmas, Tomes) listed on the maps
  • -Information and tips on how to build your characters using the Skill Trees
  • -Character strengths, weaknesses, and build types
  • -Walkthrough for all puzzles
  • -As well as other helpful information

Note: If you want to find all the Orbs or the Paradox Miasmas, you can search the guide with Ctrl+F using [Liberator Orb], [Determination Orb], [Passion Orb], [Freedom Orb], or [Paradox Miasma] including the square brackets to quickly locate which maps they are on.

Where to find the Walkthrough:
Right click Horizon Odyssey in Steam, Manage, Browse local files.
It's a PDF file called Horizon Odyssey Walkthrough

short_description: Horizon Odyssey takes place in a large world filled with secrets, so if you are the kind of player that wants to find them all, the Walkthrough will help out. It also includes strategies for all bosses, a walkthrough for all puzzles, information about character builds and pictures of most maps.
